name: AironBall: The Loop
description:
Control the aironball in and out of the hyper speed loops!

Find your way through, solve puzzles and avoid traps. Don't fall of the platforms or else you will be lost forever. Find the goal in every level and continue with your airon expedition.

Use your skill and your ability to speed up to combine and create your way through every possible platform combination in all the levels. Don't run from the loop - USE IT!
